::Perndabot/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/Nemesis Enforcer/DevilDuer::

Reptilica and Perndabot stumble back, instantly opening fire on Deemoz and 
Inzola. Perndabot growls, pulling out another rifle. He jumps back, firing 
one rifle at Deemoz and the other at Brightblade.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Nemesis Enforces swears as he sees gunfire on the scanners. He punches his 
comm-link.

"Devil, get the pit out there and see what's going on."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer sighs, running out of the base and firing at Inzola.
